description:
Hi,
 
          In my Ubuntu 12.04 server edition operating system I have installed the OpenStack using the wiki for 2 node. I was able to get the full functionality at that time. I was able to upload images and create an instances, assign the floating IP's, etc.

         After couple of days when I was trying to remove the instances then it was showing that instances was terminated but I can see that it was showing Active and trying to delete that instances. After a long time I went for reboot because it was not going anywhere. After reboot it was showing the same thing as earlier.

        I saw the services of nova and found out that it was stating running but with "XX". Then I went to logs then found out that there was error was showing, you can see that in attachment.

       After doing some search in OpenStack mailing list about this problem I found this link <https://answers.launchpad.net/horizon/+question/201069> 

       After reading above link I removed the nova compute database then recreated database then tried to sync then it was not given any error. After doing this I was not getting that earlier problem but after reboot I saw that mysql stopped working. After doing the "service mysql start" it shows "start: Job failed to start".

       Please help me out of this. If anybody knows about this problem then reply.
title: after creating new database for nova, MySQL Stops working

comments.content:
Hi,
 
          In my Ubuntu 12.04 server edition operating system I have installed the OpenStack using the wiki for 2 node. I was able to get the full functionality at that time. I was able to upload images and create an instances, assign the floating IP's, etc.

         After couple of days when I was trying to remove the instances then it was showing that instances was terminated but I can see that it was showing Active and trying to delete that instances. After a long time I went for reboot because it was not going anywhere. After reboot it was showing the same thing as earlier.

        I saw the services of nova and found out that it was stating running but with "XX". Then I went to logs then found out that there was error was showing, you can see that in attachment.

       After doing some search in OpenStack mailing list about this problem I found this link <https://answers.launchpad.net/horizon/+question/201069> 

       After reading above link I removed the nova compute database then recreated database then tried to sync then it was not given any error. After doing this I was not getting that earlier problem but after reboot I saw that mysql stopped working. After doing the "service mysql start" it shows "start: Job failed to start".

       Please help me out of this. If anybody knows about this problem then reply.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gwalashish

comments.content: No I have not got any solution for this problem till now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gwalashish
